name: Orange Pleated Kurta-Slim Pants Set
description: #UnPause celebration and shine this festive season with this contemporary ethnic kurta set. The set is having pleated kurta in closed round neckline. The waist belt comes with this kurta that defines your waist line. Coordi-ted with matching slim pant in midrise and has side zip with button closure.

name: Olive Green Printed Button Down Kurta
description: Flaunt your style in this stylish olive green button down kurta. Be ready for a coffee date or office look in this animal/bird print kurta having A-line silhouette and mandarin collar.

name: Sage Green Jacquard Kurta with Embroidery
description: Sage green straight jacquard kurta in round neck and three-quarter sleeves. It also feautures metallic embroidery.

name: Off-white Straight Kurta
description: Off-White and Navy Blue polka dot print straight kurta, has a round neck, three-quarter bell sleeves with lace, straight hem, and side slits

name: Black Placement Print Kurta
description: Jet black placement print kurta with mock line.

name: Yellow Printed Kurta with Embroidery
description: Yellow stripe print A-line kurta in round neck and gathered three-quarter sleeves. It also features embroidery on yoke.

name: Navy Tribal Print Kurta
description: Navy tribal print kurta in Key hole neckline and three-quarter sleeves.

name: Blush Pink Kurta
description: Blush pink kurta with guzette and piping details at sides and geometric embroidery at yoke.

name: Grey Jacquard Kurta
description: Grey jacquard kurta with dory embroidery at front with regular round neck and 3/4th sleeves.

name: Purple Kurta with Embroidery
description: Purple taupe straight kurta in round neck having faux V neck layer. It also features thread embroidery.

name: Ecru and Black Straight Kurta
description: Ecru and black woven dobby straight kurta in round neck and gathered three-quarter sleeves.

name: Grey Zari Straight Kurta
description: New fungi grey straight kurta with geometric prints in mandarin neck.

name: Ecru Floral Printed Kurta
description: Birch white kurta having floral print all-over. It also features keyhole neckline and three-quarter sleeves.

name: Blue Round Neck Printed Livaeco Kurta
description: Blue round neck straight kurta with printed detail. Eco-enhanced by Livaeco. #IAMAWAKE

name: Yellow Embroidered Kurta
description: Yellow and pink embroidered straight kurta, has a round neck, three-quarter sleeves, button closure, straight hem, and side slits

name: Light Green Printed Kurta
description: Light green all-over print kurta in round neck with dipped hemline and three-quarter sleeves.

name: Green Round Neck Embroidered Kurta
description: Green round neck pleated straight kurta with vertical booti embroidery detail.

name: Green Asymmetric Flared Kurta
description: Green asymmetric hem flared kurta in mandarin collar and three-quarter sleeves with embroidered yoke.

name: Navy Blue Mock Layered Kurta
description: Navy blue mock layered straight kurta with embroidery and round neck.
